title: Rigel Gjomemo
contents: Welcome! I am a Visiting Research Assistant Professor at the Department of Computer Science at the University of Illinois at Chicago and a member of the SISL Lab at UIC.     Email:  rgjome1 at uic dot edu    Phone:  312-413-0365          Research Interests My research interests span a wide range of topics focused on security. These include software, web, and mobile security, advanced persistent threats detection and prevention. I am also interested in compilers and in the application of compiler toolchains to software security.  Education     PhD:  Computer Science, University of Illinois at Chicago  2012    M.S.:  Information Engineering, Politecnico di Torino, Italy  2006    B.S.:  Information Engineering, Politecnico di Torino, Italy  2004     My full CV is here .
